title: Ad valorem taxes; authorize heavy equipment rental businesses to collect recovery fee from renters for payment of.
subject: Finance

extras.summary: AN ACT TO ALLOW A QUALIFIED HEAVY EQUIPMENT RENTAL BUSINESS TO CHARGE TO A RENTER A RECOVERY FEE IN AN AMOUNT NOT TO EXCEED 2% OF THE RENTAL CHARGE FOR EACH ITEM OF HEAVY EQUIPMENT RENTED IN THIS STATE; TO PROVIDE THAT SUCH A FEE SHALL BE USED TO PAY OR AS A REIMBURSEMENT FOR THE PAYMENT OF ANY AD VALOREM TAXES LEVIED OR ASSESSED ON THE QUALIFIED RENTAL BUSINESS'S HEAVY EQUIPMENT IN THE STATE; TO PROVIDE THAT ANY RECOVERY FEES COLLECTED THAT EXCEED THE AD VALOREM TAXES LEVIED UPON A QUALIFIED HEAVY EQUIPMENT RENTAL BUSINESS IN ANY YEAR MAY BE HELD AND APPLIED TO TAXES LEVIED OR ASSESSED IN ANY SUBSEQUENT YEAR; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
